description: The dashboard for monitoring Centrifugo real-messaging server - https://centrifugal.dev.

panels.description:
Enable with prometheus.instrument_http_handlers

Note, due to how real-time transports implemented for non-WebSocket transport metric may be written only after long-lived connection is finished.
